attributes.action: Use the japanese system for airsofting.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Airsofting originated from japan and is a very popular sport, shouldn't japan have best knowledge of what works for airsofting? Firearm crimes are low there so maybe this could improve firearm crime statistics in the uk. Some people may have firearms simply for image reasons, if Airsoft is easier to get, real firearms would be purchased less.
